text: And fortune, on his damned quarrel smiling. For brave Nomacs - well he deserves that name Disdaining fortune, with his brandish'd steel. Which smoked with bloody execution, Like valour's minion carved out his passage Till he faced the slave;.
handwritten_text: And fortune, on his damned quarrel smiling. For brave Nomacs - well he deserves that name Disdaining fortune, with his brandish'd steel. Which smoked with bloody execution, Like valour's minion carved out his passage Till he faced the slave;.
